name: Dice or Die (Boecharts, just the dani)
name_original: Dice or Die (Boecharts, just the dani)
description:
A speedrun-oriented puzzle game about Sentient Dice trying to escape highly complex Dice Cup interiors made in 48 hours.

More information soon! We are all very sleep deprived and need a break, but will update the game's itch.io page with all the details we can provide soon enough.
